column4: BRIEF-Sysco Has Placed A Reservation For 50 Of Tesla's New Fully-Electric Semi Tractors At Its Investor Day
column5: * SYSCO SAYS AT ITS INVESTOR DAY IN NEW YORK ON DEC 7  CO HAS PLACED A RESERVATION FOR 50 OF TESLA'S NEW FULLY-ELECTRIC SEMI TRACTORS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
